etymology.description: semantic: 宀 'house' + 女 'kneeling woman' → at ease, safe
etymology.interpretation: A roof over a woman evokes the image of someone calmly settled at home, conveying safety and peace. Early forms depict a seated woman under a roof as a symbol of domestic tranquility and being at ease.

examples.chinese: 我在家很安心(我在家很安心)。
examples.english: I feel at ease at home.

examples.chinese: 这里很安静(這裡很安靜)。
请你放心，孩子们很安全(請你放心，孩子們很安全)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ fàngxīn, háizimen hěn ānquán.
examples.english: Please rest assured; the children are safe.
